website_summaries.verdict: This reasonably-priced punch set works well on leather, but can also be used for metal work.
pros: Comes in a nice storage box
Works good for belt leather, but can also punch through sheet metal and brass

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Fabrication Tool
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product at a great price! I do a lot of aluminum panel fabrication and holding a drill for hours becomes cumbersome. This is a tool I’ve been needing for years and I’m glad I finally pulled the trigger on this one. The adjustable depth gauge makes it really easy to do a ton of holes around the edge of a panel quickly and accurately. I like that this tool came in a hard case with a spot for each of the dies. I would reccomend this punch to anybody who is looking to save time in their fabrication process.
customer_reviews.author: Kapono Fuller

customer_reviews.title: Extremely pleased!!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little worried about how inexpensive this tool was. I was worried that it wouldn’t punch through 16 GA steal sheet. But it worked like a charm! (Had to apply some decent force in order to puncher it, but I’d imagine that any adult could achieve this) The only reason I didn’t give it 5 stars was because the offset bracket wasn’t as easy to precisely set as I Had imagined. Not that I necessarily required such a high tolerance, but I would definitely recommend using a measuring tape when setting its position. Nevertheless, I was Extremely happy with this purchase...especially for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Devin Bowersox

customer_reviews.title: A nice punch well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: If you want to punch holes in soft copper, brass, aluminum, or some other type of sheet metal that of a reasonably thin gauge this thing is the ticket. It will punch nice clean holes of several different sizes through reasonably sized thicknesses of metals which are not hardened. Don’t try to punch through hard steel or something like that. This is a tool that should last a lifetime unless you’re using it in a commercial setting in which case you eventually might wear out the dies after years of use.

customer_reviews.title: Good for thin sheets doesn't really like 16 guage.
customer_reviews.text: Overall a good buy for the money, just not really heavy duty. The handles could be a few inches longer, and the dies tend to round the material close th the holes. If you're using this to punch sheet metal thinner than 16 gauge, it'll probably do fine. It worked good for 2 days of punching 16 gauge. I decided to double up to line up the sheets, and then added some steel pipe to the handles for leverage. That's probably where I messed up, it broke.

customer_reviews.title: Very well manufactured.

product_meta.title: ABN Power Punch Heavy Duty Hole Punch Set – Metal Hole Punch, Heavy Duty Hole Puncher Hand Punch 3/32in to 9/32in
feature_bullets: PUNCH HOLES IN YOUR PROJECT: The ABN Hole Punch Tool is a heavy duty punch and dies kit that has a high-leverage design and comfortable grips that allow you to manually create clean holes through sheet metals up to US 16 gauge; For mild sheet steel, aluminum, brass, polyurethane, plastic, canvas, cardboard, paper, shoe; Additionally use as a leather punch, belt hole puncher, metal hole punch for jewelry, and watch hole puncher; Not recommended for stainless steel such as silverware and utensils

PERFECT SIZE: Creates holes that are from 3/32-inch to 9/32-inch in diameter and includes a stop gauge for consistent spacing; 7 sizes of punches and dies include 3/32-inch (2mm), 1/8-inch (3mm), 5/32-inch (4mm), 3/16-inch (4.5mm), 7/32-inch (5.5mm), 1/4-inch (6mm), 9/32-inch (7mm); 1.75-inch (4.4cm) throat depth to punch holes as close as 1.75 inches away from material edge

EASY TO USE: This sheet metal punch uses interchangeable heads to pierce holes in a material of your choosing; Select a proper size punch and die, remove nut near handle using die adjustment tool, move connection bar, place punch on the head of hand punch, rotate nut by again using the adjustment tool to adjust caliper, and set distance between the edge and the hole; Apply lubricant (not included) after use to reduce friction, ensure a clean cut, and prolong tool life
SIMPLE STORAGE: Heavy-duty 8.75” x 4.6” x 2” inch (22.2cm x 11.7cm x 5.1cm) plastic blow-molded carrying case for easy transportation, safe storage, and quick organization
PACKAGE CONTENTS: Package includes (1) metal punch tool, (7) punches, (7) dies, (1) attached throat depth gauge, (1) die adjustment tool, and (1) storage case for your convenience
